kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Search Video Template
kw.doc: Tempalte for search ithelp aritcle need give aritcle variable

kw.name: Click Search Box
kw.doc: Click search button in ithelp home page

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Search Name
kw.doc: Input search content in search bar

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text '名偵探柯南' into text field '//*[@id="wd"]'.

kw.name: Click Search Button
kw.doc: Click search type checkbox in search area

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Video Link
kw.doc: Click search submit button in search area

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verify Video Is Existing
kw.doc: Verify search article is existing

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
